title: Colorado Rapids v San Diego FC: Visitors locked in as they look to keep momentum going
description: San Diego FC have impressed in the early stages of their time in MLS, and head coach Mikey Varas is determined to keep their streak going against the Colorado Rapids. title: Nashville SC v Real Salt Lake: Mastroeni relishing challenge of unsteady start
description: Pablo Mastroeni admitted there were challenges that came with Real Salt Lake’s rocky start in MLS but is hoping to steady the team against Nashville SC on Saturday. Real Salt Lake sit 10th in the Western Conference after seven matches this season, having won three and lost four of their matches so far.
